SELECT /* CommonCodeMngDao.searchCodeGroups */ A.* FROM code_group A
UPPER(A.cd_grp) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{searchVo.cdGrp}) || '%'
ORDER BY cd_grp ASC

SELECT /* CommonCodeMngDao.searchCodes */ A.*, J.cd_grp_nm FROM code A LEFT JOIN code_group J ON A.cd_grp = J.cd_grp
OR UPPER(A.cd_grp) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{cdGrp}) || '%'
OR UPPER(A.cd_grp_nm) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{cdGrpNm}) || '%'
OR UPPER(A.cd) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{cd}) || '%'
OR UPPER(A.cd_nm) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{cdNm}) || '%'
OR A.use_yn = #{useYn}
ORDER BY A.cd_grp, A.cd, A.seq
